snippet.title: Ultros - Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Delve into the depths of Ultros, a cosmic sci-fi exploration adventure, launching in 2024 on Playstation 4 and Playstation 5.

In this psychedelic tale from El Huervo, the creative visionary behind Hotline Miami, you wake up stranded on The Sarcophagus - a giant, cosmic uterus holding an ancient demonic being known as Ultros. Trapped in the eternal loop, you will have to explore The Sarcophagus and meet its inhabitants to understand the part you play in this cycle.

Wishlist now: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10003373

#PlayStationShowcase #ps5 #ps5games #PS4 #PS4games #ultros #AnnounceTrailer #Reveal #SciFi #Platformer #Psychedelic #Dystopian #Gardening
